doc:
Thomas Gibson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thomas_Gibson 0 Thomas Ellis Gibson (born July 3, 1962) is an American actor and director. He portrayed Daniel Nyland in the CBS series Chicago Hope, Greg Montgomery on the ABC series Dharma Greg, and Aaron Hotchner on the CBS series Criminal Minds (2005–2016). Thomas_Ellis_Gibson ( born July_3_,_1962 ) is an_American_actor_and_director . He portrayed Daniel_Nyland in the_CBS_series_Chicago_Hope , Greg_Montgomery on the_ABC_series_Dharma_ , and Aaron_Hotchner on the_CBS_series_Criminal_Minds_(_2005 – 2016_) .
